Codo » Index » QueryCSS

Class: QueryCSS

Defined in: coffee/epoch.coffee

Overview

Singelton class used to query CSS styles by way of reference elements. This allows canvas based visualizations to use the same styles as their SVG counterparts.

Variables Summary

cache = 
{}
styleList = 
['fill', 'stroke', 'stroke-width']
container = 
null

Class Method Summary

  • . (void) purge() Purges the selector to style cache
  • . (void) load() Called on load to insert the css reference element container.
  • . (String) containerId(container) @param container The containing element for a chart.
  • . (?) getStyles(selector, container) @param container HTML containing element in which to place the reference SVG.

Class Method Details

. (void) purge()

Purges the selector to style cache

. (void) load()

Called on load to insert the css reference element container.

. (String) containerId(container)

@param container The containing element for a chart.

Returns:

  • ( String ) — A unique identifier for the given container.

. (?) getStyles(selector, container)

@param container HTML containing element in which to place the reference SVG.

Parameters:

  • selector ( String ) — Selector from which to derive the styles.

Returns:

  • ( ? ) — The computed styles for the given selector in the given container element.
